ygData.subject: RE: fighting twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I thought most of the direct damage spells checked your fire and cold resist, not magic resist?  I was using Elemental and Guardian Rhythms last night with
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 29 Jul 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> Not a bad suggestion, but I prefer Crushes Tunic. Yes,
> its 3.5 lbs, but its still ac12 and the +8 to resistances
> has saved my bacon more times than I can tell. With the
> tunic, my snakeskin mask, and my Dragoon Dirk I have had
> great success soloing yellow casters. I resist about
> 85-90% of their spells with Purifying Rhythyms twisted

I thought most of the direct damage spells checked your fire
and cold resist, not magic resist? I was using Elemental and
Guardian Rhythms last night with a battle drum fighting hags
in Unrest (113 MR, 74 FR and CR, a little more or less for
others). I didn't see a single resist message. Do you even
get a resist message if you resist a DD? When I did the same
thing fighting evil eyes, we saw many "tries to charm you but
you resist" messages.

I wonder how many people are ignoring this thread because it
has "twinking" in the subject. :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
